tasks.label: Validate Agent Manifests
args: Get-ChildItem -Path 'Apps/agents/*/agent.manifest.json' -Recurse | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "Validating: $($_.FullName)"; Get-Content $_.FullName | ConvertFrom-Json | Out-Null; if ($?) { Write-Host "✓ Valid JSON" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host "✗ Invalid JSON" -ForegroundColor Red } }

tasks.label: Run Workflow Validation
args: Write-Host 'Validating workflow definitions...'; Get-ChildItem -Path 'Workflows' -Filter '*.md' -Recurse | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "Checking: $($_.Name)" -ForegroundColor Cyan; if ((Get-Content $_.FullName | Select-String 'workflow_id:').Count -gt 0) { Write-Host "✓ Valid workflow structure" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host "✗ Missing workflow_id" -ForegroundColor Red } }

tasks.label: Initialize New Analysis
args: $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd-HHmm'; $analysisDir = "Data/outputs/analysis-$timestamp"; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $analysisDir -Force; Write-Host "Created analysis directory: $analysisDir" -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host "Ready for new agentic journey analysis" -ForegroundColor Cyan

tasks.label: Generate Analysis Report
args: Write-Host 'Generating analysis summary...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; $outputFiles = Get-ChildItem -Path 'Data/outputs' -Filter '*.json' -Recurse; Write-Host "Found $($outputFiles.Count) analysis files"; $outputFiles | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "- $($_.Name)" }; Write-Host 'Analysis report generation complete' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: Clean Temporary Files
args: Write-Host 'Cleaning temporary analysis files...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Get-ChildItem -Path 'Data/outputs' -Filter '*temp*' -Recurse | Remove-Item -Force -Recurse; Write-Host 'Cleanup complete' -ForegroundColor Green
